00034 
00045 class SimpleOxygenBasedCellCycleModel : public AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel
00046 {
00047 private:
00048 
00049     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00050     template<class Archive>
00051     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00052     {
00053         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractSimpleCellCycleModel>(*this);
00054         archive & mTimeSpentInG1Phase;
00055         archive & mCurrentHypoxicDuration;
00056         archive & mCurrentHypoxiaOnsetTime;
00057         archive & mHypoxicConcentration;
00058         archive & mQuiescentConcentration;
00059         archive & mCriticalHypoxicDuration;
00060     }
00061 
00062 protected:
00063 
00068     double mTimeSpentInG1Phase;
00069 
00074     double mCurrentHypoxicDuration;
00075 
00079     double mCurrentHypoxiaOnsetTime;
00080 
00086     double mHypoxicConcentration;
00087 
00093     double mQuiescentConcentration;
00094 
00099     double mCriticalHypoxicDuration;
00100 
00101 public:
00102

00107 
00111     void UpdateCellCyclePhase();
00112 
00117     void UpdateHypoxicDuration();
00118 
00122     double GetCurrentHypoxicDuration();
00123 
00127     double GetCurrentHypoxiaOnsetTime();
00128 
00133     AbstractCellCycleModel* CreateCellCycleModel();
00134 
00138     double GetHypoxicConcentration();
00139 
00145     void SetHypoxicConcentration(double hypoxicConcentration);
00146 
00150     double GetQuiescentConcentration();
00151 
00157     void SetQuiescentConcentration(double quiescentConcentration);
00158 
00162     double GetCriticalHypoxicDuration();
00163 
00169     void SetCriticalHypoxicDuration(double criticalHypoxicDuration);
00170 
00176     void SetCurrentHypoxiaOnsetTime(double currentHypoxiaOnsetTime);
00177 
00183     virtual void OutputCellCycleModelParameters(out_stream& rParamsFile);
00184 };
